name: Rock Paper Scissors FIGHT! (Alpha)
description:
ROCK PAPER SCISSORS FIGHT is a 2D platform fighter that puts a twist on the classic game of rock, paper, scissors. Players can switch between the three to try and strike with a weapon that beats their opponent's. But choose wisely, as you'll be locked in to your weapon for a brief period of time after switching, leading to a constantly shifting match dynamic! 

Supports local multiplayer with 2-4 players. Compatible with most modern controllers (but let me know if yours doesn't work!)
